meanings.sent1: The mouse had the squeakiest voice in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The door hinges were the squeakiest in the house.
meanings.sent3: The squeakiest toy in the box always made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as squeakiest as a rusty swing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The squeakiest violin in the orchestra caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Reaching the highest pitch in sound
meanings.sent1: The singer's voice was the squeakiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The bird's chirp became the squeakiest in the early morning.
meanings.sent3: The squeakiest note on the piano surprised the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement reached the squeakiest level when she won the game.
meanings.sent5: The squeakiest whistle signaled the start of the race.

meanings.definition: Having the highest pitch in sound
meanings.sent1: The squeakiest toy car zoomed around the room.
meanings.sent2: The flute produced the squeakiest sound in the music class.
meanings.sent3: The squeakiest balloon at the party popped first.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the squeakiest when he imitated a mouse.
meanings.sent5: The squeakiest part of the song always made her smile.
